name: Rypto
description: A social media network, where users can create blog posts, read blog posts, collaborate on a post, interact in comments or privately, share books and different document formats, share pictures and short snippets of videos.

name: LikeITBuyIT
description: An ecommerce website where users can buy items on sale or register and post items for sale.
